teacher_info.intro:
I was blessed to be born dyslexic. I suffered a lot... but I never gave up. I researched every field (linguistics, neurolinguistics, psycholinguistics, cognitive science) that could help me understand how language is acquired. 

I taught hundreds of people how to acquire English and French efficiently. 
I taught myself to learn Hebrew ten years ago. Since then I helped dozens of people to do the same.
teacher_info.introduction:
For the past five years I have been getting the same question over and over again: How did you manage to learn English/French/Hebrew so well?

 A year ago I decided to answer this question and finally ended up creating my own language-learning method. In this method, I have consolidated my knowledge in linguistics, neuroscience and language teaching.

If you would like to learn English, Hebrew or Russian in an effective and enjoyable way, book your trial lesson, and we'll discuss in details.

What you can expect from our classes:

- learn the real language the way your brain learns
- no boring grammar rules and word list to memorize 
- learn to feel the language like a native speaker (if it sounds right) 
- think in the target language without translating from your mother tongue 

Последние пять лет мне все время задает один и тот же вопрос: "Как тебе удалось так хорошо выучить английский, французский, иврит?" 

Год назад я стала систематизировать свой опыт, и это вылилось в собственную методику изучение языков. В этой методике я объединила свои знания в области лингвистики, нейрологии и преподавания языков.

Если вы хотите изучать язык эффективно и с удовольствием, закажите пробный урок, и мы сможем обсудить все детали обучения.

Что вы можете ожидать от наших занятий:

 - учить живой язык согласно с тем, как работает ваш мозг 
- учиться без необходимости заучивать скучные грамматические правила и бесконечные списки слов 
- научиться чувствовать язык на уровне носителя языка 
- научиться сразу думать на языке без перевода с родного языка
teacher_info.about_me:
I was blessed to be born dyslexic. I suffered a lot... but I never gave up. I researched every field (linguistics, neurolinguistics, psycholinguistics, cognitive science) that could help me understand how language is acquired. 

I taught hundreds of people how to acquire English and French efficiently. 
I taught myself to learn Hebrew ten years ago. Since then I helped dozens of people to do the same.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Do you think that learning a foreign language is hard?
Don't know how to start learning it?

Did you know that you can learn a language efficiently? That means spend your time and money wisely.
And yes, you can enjoy learning a language a lot.

Usually people look for a perfect teacher who uses a perfect textbook, who will teach them the language.

As a language coach I help you to find your own way to acquire the language. I explain how to leverage your brain's ability to learn languages. I break down the whole process into small actionable steps. You will know what and how to do at every stage of the process.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
During my coaching sessions I help you discover how you can learn any language efficiently. If I could do it, you can do it better than me ?

For example, I explain why you should never start learning a language by reading books. Unfortunately, this is the classical way of teaching, but it is unnatural and harmful to us.

If you want to succeed in language learning, you need to have a certain mindset and NOT A TELANT! 

You need guidance and feedback as you move forward to your goal. You need someone has already gone through it several times. 

All of the sessions are recorded. No need to take notes, you can re-watch as many times as you wish and ask questions between the sessions.

pro_course_detail.title: Beginners best course for Russian speakers
pro_course_detail.description:
В этом курсе мы заложим с тобой прочный фундамент для успешного овладения английским языком. Основные строительные материалы этого курса:

- звук на устах = звук в ушах = образ в мозге
- от звука к слову
- от слова к фразе
- английское восприятие реальности
- чем русский отличается от английского
- думаем по-английски с первых дней
- естественная грамматика
- как учить слова
- и многое другое

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian course tailored for your needs
pro_course_detail.description:
This course includes all aspects of Russian: speaking, listening, reading and writing, everything you need to learn Russian as quickly and completely as possible. 
You have problems with grammar? Want to focus on conversational practice or pronunciation? Let me know so that the course exactly meet your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Practice your speaking skills and quickly start feeling more confident in your abilities. We can talk about any topic that interests you (e.g news, culture, books, music, etc.) you can let me know before the lesson if you have something specific in mind. 
I am looking forward to getting to know your hobbies and interests!
This course is recommended for B1-C2 students.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
If you want to begin learning Russian or you’ve already started this journey, this course is perfect for you. 
You will learn how to communicate in Russian in familiar everyday situations, develop basic vocabulary, read and understand texts, use the most important grammatical structures, etc.

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar practice
pro_course_detail.description: Russian grammar is notoriously complex. If you are having some trouble with Russian grammar or would like to clarify grammar points or build a strong grammatical foundation before starting another course, then this is ideal for you. This course will  help you to improve your grammar skills, vocabulary and give a practical understanding of theoretical grammar.

pro_course_detail.title: Business Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Starting from A2 level, this course is aimed to provide students with advanced knowledge of Russian business communication.
Grammar and vocabulary is taught through business contexts (for example, describing a company, applying for a job, writing a CV, understanding and analysing advertisements, talking about products and prices, etc.)

teacher_info.intro:
Здравствуйте! Меня зовут Кристина. 

In 2015 I graduated from the Krasnoyarsk State Pedagogical University as a speech therapist.
In addition, I'm a certified teacher of Russian as a second language, and I have been teaching since 2016.

Please read this before booking a lesson with me. 

1) If you start from the basic level, I don't believe in a “conversational” approach in learning Russian—that is, skipping grammar & rules and starting right away on speaking.

Here's an example: I lived in China for one year, I heard Mandarin Chinese every day for many hours. But I couldn't speak because it didn't help me to understand how the grammar works... so that experiment wasn't successful for me.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello! My name is Kristina. I'm Russian speech therapist and teacher. I worked in the school ahd kindergarten about 4 years. Also I have translated many texts from English to Russian for my friends and taught them Russian language. I like to help people to learn languages. I learned English my own, so I know some methods that really work. We will learn with a textbook by Mary Zagrebalny "My Russian friend", and use other interesting materials. I adhere to the communicative approach, so my lessons are filled with conversations and dialogues. I will help with grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and other components of speech. I always try to do my lessons the most interesting. If you need for a short time to learn how to speak Russian is not a problem. We can have a lessons every day. I adhere to the communicative approach, so my lessons are filled with conversations and dialogues. You will learn fast. And if you already know some Russian of course we can practice it. Conversations on certain topics, discussion of films, books, events and so on. Feel free to ask any questions! See you soon.
teacher_info.about_me:
Здравствуйте! Меня зовут Кристина. 

In 2015 I graduated from the Krasnoyarsk State Pedagogical University as a speech therapist.
In addition, I'm a certified teacher of Russian as a second language, and I have been teaching since 2016.

Please read this before booking a lesson with me. 

1) If you start from the basic level, I don't believe in a “conversational” approach in learning Russian—that is, skipping grammar & rules and starting right away on speaking.

Here's an example: I lived in China for one year, I heard Mandarin Chinese every day for many hours. But I couldn't speak because it didn't help me to understand how the grammar works... so that experiment wasn't successful for me.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
2) Accordingly I applied this knowledge to my lessons. I use a more standard, classical approach to create them. I teach you vocabulary and grammar, we work on pronunciation, and we consolidate knowledge in listening and speaking exercises. 

Personally I like systems, structure, tables and diagrams so I use them often. 

So my lesson is a combination of 5 components of speech: listening, general speaking, pronunciation, vocabulary, and grammar.

3) I use modern Russian books + my professional knowledge + some information from Russian media.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
4) My personal advice: the best way to see improvement in Russian is not just to take lessons with me, where you'll understand how the language works internally; revise what we learned together and do some additional exercises for at least 15 minutes every day. 

Don't limit yourself to only the time with your teacher! 

Find language partners with whom you can practice your new language skills in casual speech, subscribe to russians on social media, listen to songs, watch videos in russian, laugh at russian memes. 
 
Surround yourself with information in Russian and results will come in no time!

If you feel that my philosophy suits you, I welcome you to book a lesson!

exp_info.description:
Профессия логопеда предполагает глубокое знание структуры русского языка и его фонетики, помимо этого нужно обладать методиками преподавания и коррекции звукопроизношения. 

Все эти навыки я успешно закрепляю и приобретаю новые в течение рабочего процесса.
Более чем 3 года я преподаю русский язык как иностранный, что позволило мне овладеть различными методиками преподавания и найти наиболее успешные, которые дают лучший результат.

cert_info.description: Сертификат подтверждает владение современной методикой преподавания русского языка как иностранного с использованием современных методов, социальный сетей и технологий. Чтобы получить этот сертификат, необходимо было сдать экзамен.

OUR FIRST MEETING
To determine your level of proficiency as accurately as possible, I'll ask you some questions about yourself and we'll have a casual talk. 

After that, we’ll do a test together to check your grammar and vocabulary. 

In the end, I'll tell you some information about my lessons, show you how they look and answer your questions.

pro_course_detail.description:

You learn vocabulary and grammar, work on pronunciation, and consolidate knowledge in listening and speaking exercises. 
At the end of each lesson you get a PDF-file so you can revise everything we learned.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice in Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
На этих уроках мы обсуждаем интересующие вас темы на русском языке. У нас нет определенного плана, мы не изучаем грамматику на этих уроках. Мы практикуем ваше свободное общение на русском языке. Возможно, мы будем смотреть какое-то видео или читать статью, а потом обсуждать это. Я рекомендую бронировать эти уроки, если ваш уровень уверенный А2 и выше. 

In these lessons, we discuss topics of interest to you in Russian. We don't have a specific plan, we don't learn grammar in these classes. We practice real-life discussions and communicate freely in Russian. Maybe we'll watch a video or read an article and then discuss it. I recommend booking these lessons if your level is A2 or higher and you’re confident with speaking.

Hi, everyone! My name’s Katya. I’m a native Russian speaker living in the Siberian city – Tomsk. I have a bachelor's degree in Journalism, and now I'm studying for a master's degree in teaching Russian as a foreign language at the National Research Tomsk State University. 

Всем привет! Меня зовут Катя. Русский язык для меня родной, я живу в сибирском городе Томске. У меня есть степень бакалавра журналистики, и сейчас я получаю степень по преподаванию русского языка как иностранного в Национальном исследовательском Томском государственном университете.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, everyone! My name’s Katya. I’m a native Russian speaker living in the Siberian city – Tomsk. I have a bachelor's degree in Journalism, and now I'm studying for a master's degree in teaching Russian as a foreign language at the National Research Tomsk State University. 

Всем привет! Меня зовут Катя. Русский язык для меня родной, я живу в сибирском городе Томске. У меня есть степень бакалавра журналистики, и сейчас я получаю степень по преподаванию русского языка как иностранного в Национальном исследовательском Томском государственном университете.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have experience teaching Russian to foreign students from China, Scotland and Hungary. I have also taught 19th Century Russian literature to Chinese students and I have helped students to use scientific Russian language. 

У меня есть опыт преподавания русского языка иностранным студентам из Китая, Шотландии и Венгрии. Я также преподавала русскую литературу 19 века китайским студентам и помогала с научным текстом на русском языке.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I can explain the rules of Russian grammar and phonetics. Also I can tell you about great Russian writers and their books. We’ll talk a lot, watch Russian movies and videos, sing Russian songs and read short stories. You will learn about Russian culture and language.

Я могу объяснить правила русской грамматики и фонетики. Также я могу рассказать вам о великих русских писателях и их книгах. Мы будем много разговаривать, смотреть русские фильмы и видео, петь русские песни и читать рассказы. Вы узнаете о русской культуре и языке.

course_info.trial_description:
We will get acquainted in this lesson. You will tell me what you want to know. I will check your language level, identify problem areas and give recommendations on how to improve your skills.

На этом уроке мы познакомимся. Вы расскажете мне о том, что хотите узнать. Я проверю ваш уровень языка, выявлю проблемные зоны и дам рекомендации, как улучшить ваши навыки.

pro_course_detail.title: Improve your speaking skills
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is suitable for those who are looking for conversational practice. During the lesson, we will discuss topics of interest to you, news, movies, classical literature, facts about the country or language, or whatever you want.

Этот урок подходит тем, кто ищет разговорную практику. На занятии мы будем обсуждать интересные вам темы, новости, фильмы, классическую литературу, факты о стране или языке или то, что вы хотите.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian phonetics
pro_course_detail.description:
You will learn more about Russian phonetics, rules and features, you will also speak Russian words correctly, gradually getting rid of the accent.

Вы узнаете больше о русской фонетике, правилах и особенностях, также будете сами правильно говорить русские слова, избавляясь постепенно от акцента.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
In this lesson you will learn more about Russian grammar, understand the rules and subtleties that are difficult for you (for example, verbs of movement), learn to understand Russian speech, write and read correctly in Russian.

На этом уроке вы узнаете больше о русской грамматике, разберетесь в сложных для вас правилах и тонкостях (например, глаголы движения), научитесь понимать русскую речь, грамотно писать и читать на русском языке.

teacher_info.intro: Всем привет! Hi! My name is Tatiana, I'm a native Russian speaker born and raised in Russia. My hometown is Voronezh but I had been also living in Moscow. After finishing my bachelors in Russia I moved to Ireland and had been living in Dublin for 4 years (studying English, working in an English language school and as a content creator, and did my masters in Digital Marketing there). I've also lived in Seoul, London, Athens for a while and currently I'm based in Turkey. (Update: moved back in Moscow). My hobbies are traveling, of course :D and I'm also a professional photographer and filmmaker.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I've been an English teacher for about half a year and I decided to come back to teaching but as a Russian teacher since it's my native language and I would be happy to share my knowledge as I've been through studying foreign languages myself. I'm always impressed by the people who are willing to study Russian language as it's not the easiest one and I'll do my best to help you in this learning process.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I would be happy to prepare personalized lessons based on your goals and needs. 
On our first lesson we will get to know each other and can talk about your interests to make a plan of topics for the further conversations as well as discussing the types of materials you'd like me to use on the lessons. Can't wait to chat with you!

course_info.trial_description:
On our trial lesson:
- introduction: you will tell about yourself preferably in Russian :) (≈ 10 min)
- we'll discuss your learning goals (≈ 5 min)
- talk about your Hobbies, Passions (≈ 10 min)
- create a list of topics for future conversation lessons based on your goals/interests (≈ 5 min)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice All levels
pro_course_detail.description:
The list of conversation topics will be created based on each student's interests and needs.
I can prepare different types of materials to immerse as much as possible and cover vocabulary and phrases for each topic.
I'll also be writing down the list of mistakes made during the conversation to pay attention to so your speech will become more fluent with every conversation practice.

If you're a beginner: These lessons will also be suitable for those who just start learning and getting familiar with Russian language. We'll go through the most common phrases you need to greet, introduce yourself, tell a bit about yourself. We'll look at the phrases to use in the conversation so it will be possible to have a simple dialogue with a Russian speaking person.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons will be suitable for those who just start learning and getting familiar with Russian language. There'll be a studying program tailored for you. 
On the first lesson we'll get familiar with Cyrillic alphabet, the structure of the language, look at what makes it different from other languages. Then in the following lessons we'll be covering necessary vocabulary and phrases that'll help you to start speaking in Russian right away. 
The main focus in these lessons is on speaking/listening but there'll be also exercises on reading/ writing depending on the topic and your requests.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Vocabulary building + Speaking
pro_course_detail.description: There'll be a topic for each lesson. At first we'll go through the list of new words/phrases related to the topic and then practice it by reading/doing exercises and also practicing speaking.

teacher_info.intro:

I have many friends and acquaintances from the there, so it is not difficult for me to find a common ground with them. teacher_info.about_teacher: I have been teaching for about three years. I have experience in teaching children and foreigners. Over the course of a year, I gained valuable experience that helps me in my everyday life as well. As a teacher, I aim, first of all, at getting the student a good level of the language, trying to study with him as long as possible. I am understanding, patient, I do not put pressure students and always take into account their schedule. Besides, while improving speaking i also give a bit of knowledge of Russian culture. After all, culture and language are strongly connected
teacher_info.teaching_style: Instead of burying the student with homework, I prefer to make each lesson with him or her unique, where not only language knowledge would be given, but also knowledge about Russia itself. I try to take into account the characteristics of each student, including focusing on his or her hobbies, interests and passions. In particular, I focus on learning through the unique features of his culture. I also help students outside of our lessons, as I try to stay in touch with them

pro_course_detail.title: Preparation for TORFL
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson we are going to prepare for TORFL. It is a contemporary test of Russian language for foreign citizens. The test is needed if you want to go to university in Russia. Step by step i will help you to be ready to take all parts of the test («Письмо»; «Лексика.Грамматика»; «Чтение»; «Аудирование»; «Говорение»)

teacher_info.intro: Hey there! Nice to finally meet you ;) My name is Anton, I’m from Moscow, I speak Russian, English, and Spanish fluently. French and Italian not fluently, and at the moment I’m studying Turkish and it helps me to understand people who are starting to learn a new language, especially a language which is very different from the languages they are used to. I dance salsa and bachata, practice yoga, meditation, and mindfulness. I like to read books about self-development and I also listen to the Tim Ferris show :)
teacher_info.short_signature: Let's study languages with the life-coaching approach. It works ;)
teacher_info.about_me: Hey there! Nice to finally meet you ;) My name is Anton, I’m from Moscow, I speak Russian, English, and Spanish fluently. French and Italian not fluently, and at the moment I’m studying Turkish and it helps me to understand people who are starting to learn a new language, especially a language which is very different from the languages they are used to. I dance salsa and bachata, practice yoga, meditation, and mindfulness. I like to read books about self-development and I also listen to the Tim Ferris show :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I’ve learned every language I speak through self-study so I know how I can help you to organize your study process and achieve your goals.

During the lesson I’ll lead you through the flow of conversation and help you to correct your own mistakes and find the grammatical structures you've forgotten. In my opinion it is the best way to absorb and digest new material.

I always prepare my lessons in advance and provide my students with dynamic materials to enhance their learning.
I work with the students from the very beginning so even if you don't know how to say “Hi” it’s not a problem :)

I’m always in touch with my students in terms of providing necessary support.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I have 2 types of classes: Conversational and grammar.

If you have B1 level or above and you would like to enhance your speaking skills and listening comprehension it makes sense for you to book a conversational class.
I prefer to prepare speaking classes in advance so that you’re able to benefit more from each lesson.

-If you are a beginner (A1+) or even if you do not have any experience speaking I’d suggest that you book a general class. We will start from the basics and continue step-by-step. I have a lot of materials and worksheets.

And please don’t worry, I’m aware of the term “Students talk time” (STT) so believe me, you’ll have a lot of time for practicing your language skills.

course_info.trial_description:
Trial lesson:
🏆Hey champion who finally decided to start(or continue) studying Russian!🇷🇺 I don’t know who you are and what made you do this but you’re on the right way ;) Here I’m going to show you how my classes work.

👨‍🏫If you’re completely a beginner I’ll ask you some questions about yourself, why Russian and what level (and the most important when?) would you like to achieve. Then we will dive into Russian :) At the end of the lesson, I’ll provide you with my recommendations and give you a personal detailed lesson plan for the next 5 lessons.🎯

🗣If you are here for a speaking practice please tell me what your language level is and is there anything specific you would like to focus on? If you have no idea what we can discuss in our first lesson, no worries - leave it to me :)

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Informal tutoring / Разговорная практика Русского языка / COURSE FOR INTERMEDIATE STUDENTS (B1 - C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
If you have B1 level or above this class is exactly what you're looking for :) We will discuss different topics, enrich your vocabulary or just have a random conversation and see where it will lead us.

Since I like learning languages I’m interested not only in translating to my students words or expressions word by word but also in conveying the hidden meanings and the mindset of Russian-speaking people.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian lesson / Урок Русского языка / COURSE FOR BEGINNERS (0-B1)
pro_course_detail.description:
In my lessons, I combine communicative and grammar approaches. I prefer to take the best from each of them rather than just stick to one method. I believe that grammar can be interesting and fun in moderation.

Since I like learning languages I’m interested not only in translating to my students words or expressions word by word but also in conveying the hidden meanings and the mindset of Russian speaking people.

pro_course_detail.title: English for all levels (A0-C1)
pro_course_detail.description: In my lessons, we will focus on speaking practice and we wıll refer to grammar points only when it’s necessary to clarify some aspects. All you need is - to have a desire to tell the whole world about yourself in English :)
